name: Herbed Sage & Apple-stuffed Chicken
description: A great way to use up leftover stuffing from the holidays or make a meal extra special.
preparation: Gently separate chicken tender from each breast, but don’t completely remove. Be sure they are still attached.
Divide Sage & Apple Stuffing in half and softly squeeze into two oblong balls. Place each ball between tender and breast meat. Press together. Secure with toothpicks or tie with kitchen twine.
Brush tops of chicken with oil, then season with Herb & Garlic Dip Mix. Place in heat-proof serving dish. Bake, lid off, until chicken is cooked through, 30–35 minutes.
Let stand 8 minutes, then remove toothpicks or cut off string. Slice into thick rounds.
tips: Choose large skinless, boneless chicken breasts that still have the “tender” attached.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
